docs.abstract: Uber said Rachel Whetstone, Google’s longtime head of communications, would run its day-to-day communications operations. David Plouffe, who had that role, will move to a chief advisory position and take a director’s seat on Uber’s board.

docs.snippet: Biz Stone knows abandoning a struggling project to try something else can be a smart move. After all, he was part of a team that dumped the seldom-heard podcasting service Odeo nearly a decade ago to work on a new idea called Twitter that transfor...
docs.lead_paragraph: Biz Stone knows abandoning a struggling project to try something else can be a smart move. After all, he was part of a team that dumped the seldom-heard podcasting service Odeo nearly a decade ago to work on a new idea called Twitter that transformed how people communicate and made him a multimillionaire.

headline.main: Twitter Founder Feeling 'Super' as He Heads in New Direction
headline.print_headline: Twitter Founder Feeling 'Super' as He Heads in New Direction
